I purchased two pair of these pants. Less than two months after receiving them the zippers pulled apart on both of them and would not hold together any longer which made them unwearable. I contacted the seller and was promised replacements, but never received them and have been unable to receive a reply to follow-up emails inquiring about them. My experience was poor all around.

评论概述: Cut too low for me - returned
评论详情: Seemed to be right size but cut with very low rise. Couldn’t get them far up enough over my North American booty. If you have a slim European build and like hip-huggers - they might be OK for you but not me. A bit of trouble returning them, but Amazon helped out and we got it done.

Nice pair of jeans.  Love the cargo style.  I'm more into relax / loose fit.  I'm not trying to wear my wife's narrow leg, tight ass jeans when I leave the house?  I do have a couple of criticisms, however.  1). The zipper is hard to work.  Seems cheap compared to the quality of the pants.  2). The main button above the zipper suffers from the same problem.  Seems cheap as well compared to the pants.  Also the hole the button is supposed to slip through is pretty small, so it was a challenge at 1st to button them.  They're still tough to button/unbutton, but they seems to be getting a little easier over time.  Overall, I love the style, but I fear that I'll have to get the button and zipper replaced at some point.

I always look for the reviews with Hight and weight .I'm 6' 1" 246 got w42 fit spot on . not to baggy good look. length a tad long but not walking on them . to me length just right will be wearing on the motorcycle . quite soft right out of the packaging . feel like a well worn pair of jeans.. very happy will purchase another pair for sure..
